definition: the act of concealing yourself and lying in wait to attack by surprise, to wait in hiding to attack
details:
noun
- the act of concealing yourself and lying in wait to attack by surprise
= synonyms: lying in wait, ambuscade, trap
verb
- to wait in hiding to attack
= example: to wait in hiding to attack
= synonyms: ambuscade, scupper, bushwhack, waylay, lurk, lie in wait
- to hunt by stalking and ambushing
= example: to hunt by stalking and ambushing
= synonyms: still-hunt
